attributes.action: Award the George Cross to Leanne Lucas
attributes.background: I wish the government to award the George Cross to Leanne Lucas of Southport for her outstanding bravery protecting the children who were being attacked and killed whilst severely injured herself.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that ask for someone to be given an honour.

The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
